product_name: CygoLite TridenX 1300 OSP Front Bike Light
long_description: A lightweight, very bright bike light for high-performance riding at night, the CygoLite TridenX 1300 OSP bike light supplies 1,300 lumens of bright illumination in a sleek, compact design.
short_description: A lightweight, very bright bike light for high-performance riding at night, the CygoLite TridenX 1300 OSP bike light supplies 1,300 lumens of bright illumination in a sleek, compact design.
